name: Wrestle Angels V2
overview: Wrestle Angels V2 is the sixth title in the long-running Wrestle Angels wrestling management sim franchise. It is a remake of Wrestle Angels 2, following the same general story, but featuring the in-depth management system and many of the new characters introduced in the previous title. The interface has been streamlined since the previous title, and several new options and rule changes have been introduced, but the gameplay is generally the same as before.
